title: Authenticated -> News Page -> Top Header
custom_steps:
Given the user has clicked the News icon on the bottom nav bar
When the user arrives on the News Page
Then the user will see the following on the Top Header (from left to right):
* Account Icon
* News
* Chromecast icon 
* Browse menu hamburger icon

title: Unauthenticated -> News Page -> Top Header
custom_steps:
Given the user has clicked the News icon on the bottom nav bar
When the user arrives on the News Page
Then the user will see the following on the Top Header (from left to right):
* Log In
* News
* Chromecast icon
* Browse menu hamburger icon

title: News -> Pills Swimlane is Visible
custom_preconds: * User is on the News Page
custom_steps:
Given the user is on the News Page
When the user sees the Pills swimlane
Then the user should see the following:
* Gear Icon
* Various pills that titled

title: News -> Pills Swimlane is Visible and Scrollable
custom_steps:
Given the user is on the News Page
When the user sees the Pills swimlane
Then the user should see the following:
* Gear Icon
* Various pills that titled
* User can scroll left or right on that swimlane

title: News -> Top Article is Present with Photo and is Clickable
custom_steps:
Given user is on News Tab
When User Sees article at top of page
And Photo is present with said article
And user clicks said article 
Then user is directed to article
